H0.text: Which German philosopher wrote ‘Das Kapital’. Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

H1.text: Which German philosopher wrote ‘Das Kapital’. Friedrich Nietzsche

H2.text: Which German philosopher wrote ‘Das Kapital’. Immanuel Kant

H3.text: Which German philosopher wrote ‘Das Kapital’. Marx

A4.text: Karl Marx is best-known for the 1848 pamphlet The Communist Manifesto (written with Friedrich Engels), and his three-volume Das Kapital (1867–1894), a critique of classical political economy which employs his theory of historical materialism in an analysis of capitalism, in the culmination of his life's work.

A5.text: Volumes II and III of Das Kapital remained mere manuscripts upon which Marx continued to work for the rest of his life.
